title: AI-Driven Mock Interview System
description: An intelligent mock interview platform that uses AI to generate questions from resumes, convert them to voice, record user answers via microphone, evaluate performance, and provide feedback with score summaries. Utilizes resume parsing, OpenAI, TTS, STT, and webcam integration.

title: BlogSpace â€“ Full-Stack Blog & Comment System
description: A scalable blog platform where users can read, post, and comment on blogs. Features JWT Auth, Redis caching, rate limiting, lazy loading, moderation, and a modern frontend with animations and responsive UI.

title: Y-NOT Clothing Site
description: A full-stack MERN application for a clothing store featuring secure user authentication, product catalog, cart system, and Stripe integration for payments.

title: Gym Website
description: A modern, responsive static website for a gym built using React and CSS. Showcases services, trainers, and contact info with smooth navigation and clean UI.

title: Underwater Debris Detection
description: A deep learning project using YOLOv5 for real-time detection of underwater marine debris. Includes image preprocessing with Roboflow and alert system using Twilio.
